chapter.title: Real World Data Introduction
chapter.para: The following chapters explore real world data (RWD) (data collected from patients) and how itâ€™s application in various fields of healthcare can affect patient care. This book has presented thus far the current state of data interoperability and how and integrated knowledge management environment can enable seamless translation of data from one system to the next. This collection of chapters includes aims to shed light on topics across the healthcare spectrum from patient data privacy to emergency preparedness and how the application of Integrated Knowledge Management (IKM) can enhance the use of data in these fields. These topics revolve around the singular goal of harnessing the power of real time data to inform decision making. The power of can impact decision making, from medical ethics to policy formation, and can enhance patient care and quality in the long run.
